sentence.Network_en: The lorry driver escaped unhurt, but a pedestrian was injured.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡车司机安然脱险，但有一位行人受了伤。

sentence.Network_en: Firemen tried to free the injured and put out the blaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 消防队员努力救出伤者并扑灭大火。

sentence.Network_en: He injured his ribs in a tumble from his horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从马背上摔下来时伤到了肋骨。

entry.def: An injured person or animal has physical damage to part of their body, usually as a result of an accident or fighting.

example.ex: The other injured man had a superficial stomach wound...
example.tran: 另一名受伤男子是腹部的皮外伤。

example.ex: Many of them will have died because they were so badly injured.
example.tran: 他们中很多人会因伤势过重而死亡。

entry.def: If you have injured feelings, you feel upset because you believe someone has been unfair or unkind to you.

example.tran: 自尊心受到伤害的表情

means.word_mean: 1. usually used of physical or mental injury to persons;

auth_sentence.res_content: These women weren't injured - hair grows back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These women weren't injured - hair grows back.

auth_sentence.res_content: Never pick a leveret up unless it is injured.

auth_sentence.content: Many of our brothers have died and are injured.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many of our brothers have died and are injured.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
He remembered some talk about his mother having been injured several days before he had been born
She was injured in a car accident two weeks ago and still in critical condition.
The 1976 copy right act has not prevented these abuses fully, but it has clarified the legal rights of the injured parties and given them an avenue for remedy.
She injured her spine in a fall and a doctor told her to lie flat on her back for a month so it can mend.

sentences.en: Five people were injured in the baton charge.
